title: DC - From chat only, MAC client
body:
running league on my mac, game runs fine...mostly
experiencing constant dc's from pvp.net chat, makes it hard to call for rolls!!! hehe.
occasional slow during champ select, i.e. ill change champ or spells runes/masteries etc..and it will lag behind for 15-20 secs. chat box comes up saying its trying to communicate with server.
also having random lag spikes in game..they don't last long maybe 30 seconds at most.

not sure if these are all the same issue or not.
contacted iso iinet, and so far they advent been able to come up with a  solution. perhaps a communication issue between my isp and some servers?
any help appreciated

replies.body:
Have you tried [using an alternative DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq4)? It might sort out your issue.

Best of luck.
